feature.label: English_Tools
feature.description: Improve your english using embedded thesaurus.com and dictionary.com. Select a word and press CTRL+6 for thesaurus.com, ALT+6 for dictionary.com. Source code is available at https://github.com/kfirlevari/EnglishToolsForEclipse
